sentences.en: A roll of fat jiggled on the underside of her arm.
sentences.cn: 她胳膊下侧有一层肥肉一颤一颤的。

sentences.en: And I also catch sight of the grizzled feathers on its underside.
sentences.cn: 我看见了它两肋间斑白的羽毛.

sentences.en: Clean underside of range hood and clean or replace filters.
sentences.cn: 清理抽油烟机里侧并更换滤网.

sentences.en: Clusters of tiny insects called aphids were to be found on the underside of the leaves.
sentences.cn: 结果在树叶背面找到成串的叫作蚜虫小虫子.

sentences.en: Copper tubing for circulating water is soldered to its underside.
sentences.cn: 铜管循环水是焊接到其底部.

sentences.en: Endocrine gland lying on the underside of the Brain.
sentences.cn: 位于脑下方的内分泌腺体.

sentences.en: Glue photocopies on the underside of the glass using a PVA adhesive.
sentences.cn: 用聚乙烯醇黏合剂将图片贴在玻璃板的背面.

sentences.en: He connected metallic wires to the back and the underside of an electrical fish.
sentences.cn: 他在电鱼的背面和底面联上金属线.

sentences.en: The lid and on its underside all its occupants left their mark.
sentences.cn: 掀开桌子的顶盖,盖子底面全是各个使用者留下的记号.

sentences.en: The saw had gone across Gross's left rib cage through the underside of his liver.
sentences.cn: 锯子锯进格罗斯的左胸腔,通过肝脏下方.

sentences.en: The soft belly or underside of an animal's body.
sentences.cn: 下腹部腹部柔软部分或动物''.'下腹'''.

sentences.en: The underside forms the combustion chamber with the top of the piston.
sentences.cn: 气缸盖下面与活塞顶上的空间形成燃烧室.

sentences.en: The underside of the rock was covered with seaweed.
sentences.cn: 岩石的下面布满了海草.

sentences.en: They painted the underside of their planes with a black varnish.
sentences.cn: 他们在飞机的底部涂上了一层黑漆.

sentences.en: Well done! This is called point. This circle is called underside.
sentences.cn: 师:很好, 这个点叫做顶点.这个圆叫做底面.

trans.tran_cn: 下侧，下部表面，底面，阴暗面
trans.tran_en: The underside of something is the part of it which normally faces towards the ground
